components.name: accordion
components.description: Collapsible content sections with expand/collapse animation

components.name: alert
components.description: Inline notification component with 4 variants (info, success, warning, error), optional dismiss button, and customizable icons

components.name: avatar
components.description: Circular avatar component with image support and fallback text for initials

components.name: badge
components.description: Notification badge overlay component that displays count on top of children with red/blue variants

components.name: box
components.description: Flexible container component for layouts with spacing, sizing, and flexbox props

components.name: button
components.description: Pressable button component with 4 variants, 5 sizes, icon support, and loading states

components.name: card
components.description: Content container with elevation, borders, and padding for grouping information

components.name: checkbox
components.description: Selectable checkbox control for boolean inputs with support for checked, unchecked, and indeterminate states

components.name: container
components.description: Centered max-width wrapper for page content with responsive width constraints

components.name: divider
components.description: Visual separator line with horizontal or vertical orientation

components.name: fab
components.description: Floating action button with placement options and extended variant

components.name: input
components.description: Single-line text input field with label, error state, and prefix/suffix icon support

components.name: label
components.description: Form label component with optional required indicator and error state for describing input fields

components.name: progress
components.description: Visual progress indicator with bar and circle variants, determinate and indeterminate modes, and optional value display

components.name: radio
components.description: Single-selection radio button control with group management for choosing one option from a set

components.name: select
components.description: Dropdown picker component with search and multi-select support for selecting from a list of options

components.name: skeleton
components.description: Placeholder loading component with shimmer animation, supports rectangle, circle, and text line shapes with customizable dimensions

components.name: slider
components.description: Range slider control for selecting numeric values with single or dual thumb support

components.name: spinner
components.description: Animated loading indicator with continuous rotation, size presets (sm, md, lg) or custom pixel size, and color customization

components.name: stack
components.description: Layout component for arranging children with consistent spacing and alignment

components.name: switch
components.description: Toggle switch for binary on/off states with animated transitions

components.name: tag
components.description: Small pill-shaped label for categorization with 5 color variants, 3 sizes, and optional dismiss functionality

components.name: tabs
components.description: Tabbed navigation with multiple variants and orientations

components.name: textarea
components.description: Multi-line text input field with auto-resize capability and character count display

components.name: toast
components.description: Temporary notification component with slide-in animation, 4 variants, top or bottom positioning, and auto-dismiss capability

components.name: typography
components.description: Text component with 11 iOS-inspired typography variants using StyleSheet
